sentence.Network_en: Otherwise, they would not feel compelled to make ex gratia payments to customers they have wronged.
sentence.Network_cn: 否则，他们不会觉得必须向那些没有受到公平待遇的顾客提供补偿款。

sentence.Network_en: Apart from statutory compensation, there is a system of ex gratia payments.
sentence.Network_cn: 除法定补偿外, 政府也会按一套特惠补偿方法,发放特惠补偿.

sentence.Network_en: Exempli gratia have in internet work and cose and phone.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们通过网上工作、聊天、打电话等等.
